It is absolutely not a bad game . It has simple gameplay mechanics and maps . Easy to learn , hard to master :D Deathmatch Classic might look like a Quake rip-off , but it is just good and still fun , but the biggest and the only problem with this game is that it is just basically almost totally DEAD ... almost literally nobody plays this game and it was really hard to find server with good ping for me ( I am from EU ) and have fun with anyone . But , if you have at least one friend to 1v1 you in this game , I highly recommend it :)

Klasik deathmatch işte...

Believe it or not, this game is actually pretty fun. I find myself enjoying (whenever I get onto a server with people) the fast paced arena shooter action. It feels like a Quake Ripoff in some ways, but it actually isn't, being more of a love-letter. I wish there were more games like this coming out in the current years. The best part is that it isn't just for PCs (since I'm confined to the family Mac R.I.P). However, the only downside I can think of is that there just isn't anybody ever playing this game! I go onto the server list and almost every time it shows 0 people. So yeah, I think you should buy this game. We need to make it an effort for people to play this more, because it really is fun when you get someone else to play against!

Deathmatch Classic – сетевой, мясной шутер от первого лица. Давным-давно в далекой галактике, безумные высшие разумы наигравшись в Кваку решили создать свою реальную арену. Они вторглись в первый попавшийся на их пути мир и похитили несколько местных существ, дав им в руки оружие. Этот мир был вселенной Half-Life и даже G-Man стал пешкой в их руках. Не важно кто ты был в своем мире, Гордон, G-man, или даже ходячий зомби с хедкрабом на голове, у всех теперь лишь одна цель: выжить. Убей, или будешь убит. – таким мог бы быть сюжет, но его там нет. Нам лишь предстоит выбрать свою аватару, взять в руки оружие и разгромить всех вокруг!

Данная игра всецело пытается походить на сетевые баталии первой Кваки скопировав с нее все по максимуму, оставив лишь свои модельки персонажей, да топор заменив монтировкой. Что касаемо карт, я не эксперт в этом деле, но как по мне, они не просто взяты и скопированы все с той же Quake 1, а воссозданы, хоть и на их основе, но с нуля. Что еще можно сказать об этой игре? Да, она уже достаточная старенькая, но онлайн, пускай хоть и в пару калек, но все же есть.

Стоит ли вам ее покупать? Я бы не рекомендовал брать ее отдельно, если только вас не интересует ностальгия, а вот взять в бандле самое то! Что касаемо поиграть в нее, тут уж решать только вам. Но скажу по себе, что до этого я не был знаком с этой игрой, но зайдя, как я рассчитывал, на пару минут, я задержался на несколько часов.

Маус одобряет! =)

Ya bizim Türk insanında cidden bir sorun var. Adamlar Quake kitlesine QuakeWorld falan hiç uğraşmadan direkt girip oynayabilecekleri gayet sağlam çalışan bir Multiplayer Arcade FPS yapmış, bazı davarlar gelip "qUaKE ÇaKmAsI eĞğ" falan yazmış. Yani gerçekten bilmiyorum...

É melhor comprar Quake 3 Arena que até hoje possui diversos jogadores.

[b]Nota: [u]??/10[/u][/b]

Another Valve multiplayer game that's completely dead. No story here so we're jumping straight into graphics. 

Graphics:

Since this is running of the same engine as the first Half Life game, it's no surprise that this game is dated in the art department. There's nothing really that special about it and most textures (apart from guns) seemed to be ripped out from Half Life. 

Audio:

The audio design is decent, but overall nothing special. The guns sound meaty and the explosions have the same nice sound like in Half Life, albeit a little distorted. Overall nothing too note worthy. 

Gameplay:

Deathmatch Classic is Valve's throwback to Id Software's arena shooters like Quake. It's honestly a decent game, but sadly like most other Valve classic multiplayer games, it's absolutely dead. Unlike most of their other games I managed to play a match, but this was on a server that had insane ping, making it basically unplayable. 

My shots would go straight through people, so I couldn't kill anyone and after sometime I just quit out. Other servers were completely empty and I couldn't get any matches going. 

Verdict:

This one seems like a decent game, but sadly it's completely dead so I cannot recommend this one, when games like Quake still have players kicking around in their servers. So skip this one. 

Final Rating:
5/10

Pros:
+ Gameplay is fun 
+ Guns have meaty sounds

Cons:
- Game is completely dead and some servers have too high of a ping

If you liked this review please consider joining https://steamcommunity.com/groups/completingthebacklog and https://steamcommunity.com/groups/ImperialReviews

[b][Since this game shares the same fate as Ricochet, the review for this title itself will be verbatim to the review for that title.][/b]

[i]Deathmatch Classic[/i] seems like an interesting idea, but any time I have ever attempted to play it, there are no players online.

With the amount of people complaining about nobody being online, you'd think that eventually you'd run into maybe one or two people playing the actual game or waiting for others to join in while they play with bots, but this is never the case. 

The sighting of another player on here is next to none, and I would assume it to be almost impossible to experience this with other human beings unless you and a few of your friends got together and joined or created a lobby, therefore know what you are paying for when you get this title. Do not expect a easily joined multiplayer experience with frequent players: you will have to create your own multiplayer experience with [i]Deathmatch Classic[/i].

I feel as though the complete lack of dedicated players speaks to the quality of this release on its own, and frankly, if it was truly of great quality like positive reviews assure you of, I think there would be at least one other living, breathing being in a lobby after multiple attempts at finding one, and with this in mind, it's hard to believe this was a great experience in the first place if it is dead and buried while other games of its time are still kicking.

[b][RATING: N/A][/b]
